00034     public abstract class Behavior
00035     {
00036         protected EnemyPlaneObj parent;
00037         internal BehaviorState behaviorState;
00038         internal Random rand;
00039         public Behavior(EnemyPlaneObj parent)
00040         {
00041             this.parent = parent;
00042             rand = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);
00043         }

00046         public abstract Behavior clone(EnemyPlaneObj newParent);

00048         /* this method takes in an array of behavior states and checks it against a list of behaviors, the first match behavoir is return */
00049         internal Behavior firstBehaviorfirstGet(List<Behavior> behaviors, params BehaviorState[] behaviorOrder)
00050         {
00051             foreach (BehaviorState bs in behaviorOrder)
00052                 foreach (Behavior b in behaviors)
00053                     if (b.behaviorState == bs)
00054                     {
00055                         // Applies some percentages here to elimate predictability or strike with surprise
00056                         //if(rand.NextDouble() <= 0.50)
00057                             return b;
00058                     }
00059             return null;
00060         }
00061 
00062         internal abstract void Update(Map map, GameTime gameTime);
00063     }
